thread.title: Day After Trump Issues ‘Muslim Ban,’ He BLOWS UP the Internet with Unexpected Announcement…
thread.title_full: Day After Trump Issues ‘Muslim Ban,’ He BLOWS UP the Internet with Unexpected Announcement…

author: Nickarama
title: Day After Trump Issues ‘Muslim Ban,’ He BLOWS UP the Internet with Unexpected Announcement…
text:
09:58pm   
  temporary ban on entry from 7 predominantly Muslim countries has caused an uproar on the left and in media. 
Dozens of people were stopped at airports across the country. 
Protests then cropped up at the airports. 
The ACLU and other organizations filed lawsuits against the ban. 
A temporary stay on the implementation of the ban as to legal residents and other valid visa holders was ordered by a federal judge in New York. 
The DHS responded that they would comply with the judge’s order, but would also continue to enforce Trump’s executive order. 
Now Trump is weighing in with the following statement: 
He makes a few salient points. 
1. Obama banned entry from Iraq in 2011 after terrorists were mistakenly let through, the exact concern here. There was no Democratic or media outrage then. 2. Obama flagged the 7 countries as of special concern , Trump didn’t pull them out of the air. 3. It isn’t a Muslim Ban as media is saying because it leaves out most of the Muslims in the world. It applies only to the 7 countries, 40+ other countries which are majority Muslim are not named. LIKE this article?
